title: Matvey Uzhgin
text:
Matvey Alekseyevich Uzhgin (; born 23 November 2000) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="FC%20Chayka%20Peschanokopskoye">FC Chayka Peschanokopskoye</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Yenisey%20Krasnoyarsk">FC Yenisey Krasnoyarsk</a> on 5 October 2019 in a game against <a href="FC%20Nizhny%20Novgorod">FC Nizhny Novgorod</a>.
